func.title: VIS_Enemies
func.desc: Constant for GetVisibility/SetVisibility. The object is visible for all enemires of the owner.
func.remark: This value is also defined as a constant. Thus the parameter brackets can be omitted.

example.code: for(var obj in FindObjects(Find_Or(Find_ID(BANR),Find_ID(BANP)))) SetVisibility(VIS_Enemies | VIS_God, obj);
example.text: All banners are only visible for the individual enemies of their owners.
